Help.main_info: Reactify is a role management and role reaction bot for servers to manage and automate giving roles to users with some nice utility.
Help.set_prefix: Set a custom prefix for the bot.
Help.use_slash_commands: Use Discord slash commands to setup reaction roles.
Help.use_create: Setup reaction roles without using slash commands.
Help.use_invite: Invite this bot to your server.
Help.use_website: Visit the bot website for more info and other bots.
Help.features_enabled: These features have been enabled on the server.
Help.no_features: No features have been enabled on the server.
Help.feature_reaction: Get server roles by clicking a reaction.
Help.feature_blacklist: Blacklist users from getting roles in reaction roles or other commands.
Help.feature_logs: Log reaction roles, roles given/taken or last roles when someone leaves the server.
Help.feature_messages: Set custom messages when some boosts or becomes a patreon donator in your server.
Help.feature_birthday: Get a server role when it's your birthday.
Help.feature_cotd: Get a role that changes color every day.
Help.feature_color: Get a color role in a server.
Help.config_require_server: Config commands and reaction roles requires a Discord server to use, please invite the bot.
Help.config_setup_reactions: Use Discord slash commands or create command to setup Reaction Roles.
Help.config_import_reactions: You can also import reaction roles from other bots.

Errors.no_config: Server has no config or data.
Errors.feature_unavailable: This feature is not available yet.
Errors.no_user: Could not find that user in this server.
Errors.no_custom_message: You need to enter a custom message.
Errors.use_slash_commands: You need to use Discord slash commands or create command.
Errors.enter_role: You need to enter a role name.
Errors.no_role: Could not find that role name.
Errors.invite_bot: You need to invite the bot to use these features.
Errors.user_blacklisted: You have been blacklisted from getting any roles by server staff.

Config.title: Server Config
Config.features_list: List of features that have been setup for the server.

Reset.info: Reset the server config and remove data.
Reset.title: Config Reset
Reset.confirm_this: To reset the server config you need to confirm this.

Boost.info: Send a custom message when someone boosts your server with Discord nitro.
Boost.no_channel: No boost log channel has been set.

Expire.info: Send a custom message when someone's boost status expires.
Expire.no_channel: No expire log channel has been set.

Leave.info: Log the last roles someone had when they leave the server.
Leave.no_channel: No leave log channel has been set.

Patreon.info: Send a custom message when someone becomes your Patreon subscriber.
Patreon.no_channel: No patreon log channel has been set.

Reaction.info: Log when someone uses a reaction roles message with the role given/taken.
Reaction.no_channel: No reaction role log channel has been set.

Role.info: Log when a user has been given or taken a role.
Role.no_channel: No role log channel has been set.

Log.set_message: Set a custom message to send.
Log.use_placeholders: Use these placeholders in custom messages.
Log.set_channel: Set a channel to post messages to.
Log.toggle_mention: Toggle if the user should be mentioned.

Blacklist.title: User Blacklist
Blacklist.info: Blacklist a user from getting reaction roles or other role commands.
Blacklist.add_user: Add a user to the blacklist with an optional reason.
Blacklist.remove_user: Remove a user from the blacklist.
Blacklist.user_info: Get information about a blacklisted user.
Blacklist.user_added: User has been added to the blacklist.
Blacklist.user_removed: User has been removed from the blacklist.

Delete.info: Delete a reaction role, message or all.

List.info: Get a list of reaction roles that have been setup.

Toggle.info: Set a reaction role message to normal or single role only.

Import.info: Import reaction role data from other bots.

Check.info: Check if reaction roles is working fully.

Role.info: Get role information by role name or ID.
Role.get_color: You can get a color role.

Misc.getting_users: Getting all server users, please wait.
